alert.note: Alert for Iron; Washington (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 16 at 12:27AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM MDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall combined with snowmelt is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southern Utah, including the following counties, Iron and Washington. * WHEN...Until 800 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas including low water crossings, normally dry washes and streams. Poor drainage areas will continue to see ponding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1224 AM MDT, rain and snowmelt is causing minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Washington, New Harmony, Dameron Valley, Gunlock State Park, Ivins, Enterprise, Leeds, Pine Valley, Veyo, Pinto, Snow Canyon State Park and Gunlock.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
